title: Bug 11314 - Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
description: The description of this bug report is missing, but I will provide clear and informative statements for the OB, EB, and SR sections based on the provided information.
OB: When attempting to replace package name fragments, the system currently allows users to enter a sequence '2~.'
EB: The expected behavior is that the system should not permit users to enter '2~.' as it violates the rule that package name fragments should always be smaller.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Replace Package Name Fragments' feature.
3. Attempt to enter '2~.' as a package name fragment to be replaced.
